com.jjoe64.graphview

Class SecondScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jjoe64.graphview.SecondScale

  • public class SecondScale
extends java.lang.Object
    To be used to plot a second scale on the graph. The second scale has always to have manual bounds. Use setMinY(double) and setMaxY(double) to set them. The second scale has it's own array of series.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected LabelFormatter mLabelFormatter
      label formatter for the y labels on the right side
      protected java.util.List<Series> mSeries
      array of series for the second scale
      protected Viewport mViewport
      reference to the viewport of the graph
